com.codename1.rad.ui

Class ViewProperty<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codename1.rad.ui.ViewProperty<T>

  • public class ViewProperty<T>
extends Object

    A property of a EntityView. A View Property allows an EntityView to declare parameters that it will accept to customize its rendering or behaviour. The property can be "filled" by adding a ViewPropertyParameter to the node tree in the view’s view node or any parent. This allows a view to, for example, accept direction on what UIID to use in the component, or which Tags to bind parts of its UI to.

    See Also:
    UI.param(com.codename1.rad.ui.ViewProperty, java.lang.Object), UI#param(com.codename1.rad.ui.ViewProperty, com.codename1.rad.models.Tag…​)
